Name: The Great Chicken Thief
About the game: Foxy wants to be rich but hates work. She continually thought about how to make money easily, quickly and without much effort. To do this, she needed to focus on a plan and put it into action. While thinking she heard a rooster crowing on a distant farm, and a small idea started to form in her head ... - Use your stealth and don't get caught. - Steal all the chickens and leave without being seen.
